title: ‘Movie should also be made on killings of Muslims’: MP IAS officer in trouble with govt over ‘Kashmir Files’ tweets - The Indian Express
content:
1. ‘Movie should also be made on killings of Muslims’: MP IAS officer in trouble with govt over ‘Kashmir Files’ tweets  The Indian Express
  2. Live News | Kashmir Files | Congress Slams Film As Propaganda | Kashmiri Pandits React | Updates  TIMES NOW
  3. The Script Is Shoddy, Truth Is Distorted But The Sole Intent of 'The Kashmir Files' Is Manipulation of Emotions  The Wire
  4. The Kashmir Files holds no ‘grand truth’ to ‘open your third eye’. It exploits cinema’s flaws  ThePrint
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: State minister Vishvas Sarang accuses Niyaz Khan of sectarianism, demands his removal from PWD.
